publishing_focus.primary_focus: Christian fiction, Biblical narratives and parables
publishing_focus.target_audience: Devoted Christian readers of all ages, seeking inspiration and spiritual growth through storytelling
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Committed to combining the power of compelling storytelling with deep spiritual insights. We focus on quality, authenticity and scriptural integrity, allowing readers to enrich their faith through engaging fictional narratives.
publishing_focus.example_titles: Author types like Francine Rivers, Karen Kingsbury; Titles like 'The Masterpiece', 'A Time to Dance'
